name: Bree k
text:
First off, this is a Wal Mart neighborhood store, Not EcoATM

Hard to find the weak link in the chain of command at this store cause the managers are just as bad as their worst worker.
They do not stock enough of the items that are bought the most (2liter twist-up & Pall Malls are two such idems)
The restrooms seem to have dry residues on the toilet seats.
Everyone from the management to the homeless smoke around the Coke machine and Propane Gas Tanks.
Last minute drinks are by the door and away from the registers.
Drug deals happen in the parking lots in plain sight of children and cameras.
....and always with Lanes closed and self checkout giving me $95 in five dollar bills back as change from $100!!?!!?!
Let me not forget that I have to back track after purchasing my food and reroute because of a pallet of ice blocking me from being able to walk my cart out normally as done in only every other Wal Mart

It's the little things that you remember
